CustomField.formula: CASE(Health_Segment__c, 'Program Score', $CustomMetadata.Health_Score_Elements__mdt.Program_Score.Recommended_Action_Steps__c, 'Renewal Timing', $CustomMetadata.Health_Score_Elements__mdt.Renewal_Timing.Recommended_Action_Steps__c, 'Cross Sells/Expansions', $CustomMetadata.Health_Score_Elements__mdt.Cross_Sells_Expansions.Recommended_Action_Steps__c, 'Client NPS', $CustomMetadata.Health_Score_Elements__mdt.Client_NPS.Recommended_Action_Steps__c, 'Interaction Cadence', $CustomMetadata.Health_Score_Elements__mdt.Interaction_Cadence.Recommended_Action_Steps__c, 'Executive Sponsor Interaction/Engagement', $CustomMetadata.Health_Score_Elements__mdt.Executive_Sponsor_Interaction_Engagement.Recommended_Action_Steps__c, 'Contract Path/Partner Relationship/Status', $CustomMetadata.Health_Score_Elements__mdt.Contract_Path_Partner_Relationship_Statu.Recommended_Action_Steps__c, 'Client Business Health', $CustomMetadata.Health_Score_Elements__mdt.Client_Business_Health.Recommended_Action_Steps__c, 'Issues', $CustomMetadata.Health_Score_Elements__mdt.Issues.Recommended_Action_Steps__c, 'Competitor w/in account', $CustomMetadata.Health_Score_Elements__mdt.Competitor_w_in_account.Recommended_Action_Steps__c, 'Immediate Action Needed', $CustomMetadata.Health_Score_Elements__mdt.Immediate_Action_Needed.Recommended_Action_Steps__c, '')
CustomField.label: Account Level RAS
